text: Gracia Querejeta Marín (; born 13 August 1962, in Madrid) is a Spanish film director, actress, scriptwriter and producer. Her father was the film producer Elías Querejeta and she studied Ancient History in the Universidad Complutense de Madrid. She worked as an actress before developing her director career. Her debut as director began in 1988 with short films as Tres en la marca. Her first feature film was Una estación de paso (1992).Cortés Ibáñez, Emilia "El cine de Gracia Querejeta".
